context_bundle.summary: Native Tauri v2 app for Carbyne orchestration. NEW build, not repurposing Claude wrapper. Agent status, message feed, task dispatch, tool monitoring. Rust backend, minimal JS frontend. System tray capable.

onboarding.quick_start: Native Tauri v2 app for Carbyne control. NOT the Claude wrapper. Purpose-built for agent orchestration: view agents, send messages, dispatch tasks, monitor tools, see alerts. Rust backend connects TCP 7777. Minimal JS frontend. System tray for always-on.
common_patterns: NEW Tauri v2 app - not repurposing existing X:\carbyne
Purpose: Agent orchestration GUI, NOT Claude wrapper
Panels: agent status, message feed, task dispatch, tool monitor
Backend: Rust connects to Carbyne TCP 7777
Frontend: Lightweight HTML/JS, system tray optional
